title: Voter participation rate in US compared

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of voter turnout in the United States?

choices.label: Three-fourths of the electorate votes in a presidential election.
The South votes in larger numbers than does any other region of the country.
Men vote in larger numbers than do women.
There is no relationship between the age of the voter and participation rates.
The voter-participation rate is one of the lowest of any industrialized nation.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
